details.title: Hotel Products
details.subTitle: Nylon 80
details.des: Our general-purpose towel products such as face towels, bath towels, and bath mats in plain, yarn-dyed, jacquard, and printed styles are also well-received by our customers. We can accommodate small lots as well.
